title: Kylie Jenner parties with ex Tyga following Travis Scott split
text:
She announced her split from rapper Travis Scott earlier this week but set tongues-wagging when she was spotted days later at her ex Tyga's recording studio.

And Kylie Jenner,22, continued to put her relationship woes behind her as she partied with her former flame, 29, at West Hollywood club Hyde Lounge on Saturday.

The beauty mogul attempted to remain inconspicuous as she arrived to the club holding onto her bodyguard's shoulders and was followed out by a pal.

Girls' night out: Kylie Jenner,22, put her relationship woes behind her as she enjoyed a single girls' night out at West Hollywood club Hyde Lounge on Saturday

The reality star appeared in jovial spirits as she made her way to the club from her waiting car in a form-fitting pink mini dress.

Keeping to her glamorous display, she worked her brunette locks into a voluminous style and accessorised the look with an eye-catching diamond necklace.

Arriving separately, the rapper was seen driving to the venue in his bold red custom Ferrari with a friend.

The Rack City hitmaker was pictured standing underneath the club's purple lighting in a blue and black striped long-sleeved T-shirt, diamond chain and baseball cap.

Spotted: Arriving separately, the rapper, 29, was seen driving to the venue in his bold red custom Ferrari with a friend

Stepping out: The beauty mogul attempted to remain inconspicuous as she arrived to the club holding onto her bodyguard's shoulders and was followed out by a pal

Pink to make 'em wink: The reality star appeared in jovial spirits as she made her way to the club from her waiting car in a form-fitting pink mini dress

Notably Kylie wasn't alone with the rapper as sister Khloe, who split from Tristan Thompson in February, was spotted also arriving to the venue.

The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star donned an all black look for the outing and worked her peroxide blonde bob into a sleek style.

She added a pop of colour to her ensemble with a neon yellow eyeshadow and an array of gold statement rings.

Despite arriving separately, Khloe gave her 98.7million Instagram followers a glimpse of their raucous night out as she took to the platform's story and shared a clip of them inside the club.

Showing off Kylie's pink mini dress, Khloe then turns the camera on herself as the two pose together.

The night out comes days after Kylie insisted her 2am visit to her ex Tyga's recording studio earlier this week was innocent.

The 22-year-old took to Twitter on Thursday morning after her late night visit emerged in exclusive pictures obtained by DailyMail.com.

Mane attraction: Keeping to her glamorous display, she worked her brunette locks into a voluminous style

All in the details: She accessorised the look with an eye-catching diamond necklace

Helping hand: The star looked down as she carefully got out of her car

Taking to Instagram she told fans: 'The internet makes everything 100 times more dramatic than what it really is. There was no "2am date with Tyga". You see me drop two of my friends off at a studio that he happened to be at.'

The seeming connection between the two raised eyebrows, coming just the day news broke that Kylie and her baby daddy Travis Scott had secretly broken up weeks ago.

But Kylie wrote on Thursday: 'Travis and I are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi‼️ our friendship and our daughter is priority.'

Tyga has not commented on his links with Kylie. Instead he posted an emoji image of a cap, just half an hour after Kylie's damage control tweets.

Sister, sister: Sister Khloe Kardashian, 35, joined her for the fun-filled night out

Blonde ambition: She worked her peroxide blonde bob into a sleek style

Party time: Arriving separately, sister Khloe, who split from Tristan Thompson in February, donned an all black look for the outing

The simple image had no caption. However his message was taken by some to refer to 'cappin it' - a slang term for someone who is lying and attempting to put a cap on it.

On Tuesday, Kylie partied with pals Anastasia 'Stassi' Karanikolaou and Kelsey Calemine at West Hollywood hot spot Delilah from around midnight until shortly after 2am.

Kylie looked downcast as she got into her blue Rolls Royce with her pals while leaving the hotspot.

In an eyebrow-raising twist, they headed straight to the studio where Tyga was at work. Curiously, rather than dropping her pals off at the main entrance, the Rolls Royce was pictured parked up for some time inside the hotel's lot.

Colour pop: She added a pop of colour to her ensemble with a neon yellow eyeshadow

Bag it up: The Revenge Body host carried a statement beige and black Fendi bag

Going for gold: She also sported an array of gold statement rings

On her way: The E! reality star looked relaxed as she made her way to the venue

Despite her later denials, Kylie's spokesperson at first declined to comment when contacted by DailyMail.com on Wednesday.

Her entourage - Stassi and Kelsey - were spotted getting out of the blue Rolls Royce and later left the hotel via the same exit as Tyga around 3am. (Stassi and Kelsey headed home in a black SUV.)

Kylie managed to stay out of sight during the stop at Sunset Marque, with one onlooker claiming she left via a different exit. However she insists she was simply giving her pals a ride, and did not visit Tyga.

Having fun: Despite arriving separately, Khloe gave her 98.7million Instagram followers a glimpse of their raucous night out as she took to the platform's story and shared a clip of them inside the club

Kylie is said to be on friendly terms with her ex and they do occasionally run in the same circles. In fact, she came face to face with him at a strip club called the Sapphire Las Vegas Gentlemen's club in late August, according to TMZ .

They were at the strip club, which offers private rooms and pole dancing, for Sofia Richie's 21st birthday celebrations.

News of Kylie and Travis' decision to put their relationship broke on Tuesday afternoon. They actually split several weeks ago, after a long period of rows, according to TMZ.

The lip kit mogul began dating the Sicko Mode performer, 28, at Coachella in 2017 and within weeks she was pregnant with their now 20-month-old daughter, Stormi Webster - who they are said to be amicably co-parenting.

The last time the couple were pictured together was at the August 27 premiere of the Netflix documentary, Travis Scott: Look Mom I Can Fly, which chronicles the rapper's personal and professional life.

The romance has reportedly been cooling off ever since, yet the insider indicated the relationship wasn't completely over either.

Another source told E! News: 'Kylie and Travis aren't officially calling it quits on their relationship, but are taking space apart.
description: The beauty mogul attempted to remain inconspicuous as she arrived to the club holding onto her bodyguard's shoulders and was followed out by a pal.
